name: pdfreader
description: Read text and parse tables from PDF files. Supports tabular data with automatic column detection, and rule-based parsing.

scripts.prettier:check: npm run -s prettier:print 1>&2; exit $(npm run -s prettier:print | wc -l)
scripts.test:diff:buffer: node parseAsBuffer.js test/sample.pdf >test/test-buffer-snapshot.log; git --no-pager diff test/test-buffer-snapshot.log 1>&2; exit $(git --no-pager diff test/test-buffer-snapshot.log | wc -l)
scripts.test:legacy: npm run -s test:sample && npm run -s test:diff && echo âœ…  All tests passed.

author: Adrien Joly
